column10: This crosswalk needs a beacon or to be moved to a visible location; Inability to see crosswalk before it’s too late to stop; Despite being vigilant this crosswalk is located just over a slope and isn’t visible until you’re too close to stop. I’ve almost hit pedestrians despite driving safely because I did not expect anyone to walk into the street because crosswalk isn’t visible

column10: At Cherry Hill Rd and Woodrow St there is a stub of metal sign post sticking up from the grass just enough to trip someone (me).
column21: PLEASE remove this partial sign post
column32: 4401 Cherry Hill Rd Apt 77 Arlington VA 22207
